name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Highly skilled Senior Software Engineer with over 10 years of experience in developing high-quality backend systems and services. Proficient in **JavaScript**, **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask), **Go**, and **C++**, with a strong focus on AI/ML integration and cloud-native architectures. Expertise in creating scalable APIs and automation tools, leveraging cloud platforms such as **AWS** and **Azure**. Recognized for exceptional communication and documentation skills, contributing significantly to impactful projects at leading organizations including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Python** to develop backend services in **FastAPI**, enhancing automation, user onboarding, and reporting workflows.
Engineered solutions in **JavaScript** and **Go** to foster event-driven architectures, significantly improving the management of asynchronous processing for financial transactions.
Deployed robust microservices using **Azure App Services** and leveraged **Terraform** to maintain **Infrastructure as Code (IaC)** for cloud operations.
Created and optimized data pipelines with **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions** ensuring timely data flow for regulatory exchanges, achieving over **95% accuracy** in data transfer.
Implemented secure authentication systems integrating **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C**, boosting security and scalability by over **30%**.
Actively collaborated with cross-functional teams to resolve integration challenges, ensure regulatory compliance, and lead release strategies, contributing to a **50% reduction** in deployment times.
Demonstrated excellent **communication** skills in documenting processes and workflows, facilitating knowledge sharing across teams.

• Developed backend systems using **Python** and **FastAPI** to automate document workflows, which enhanced user onboarding by **30%** and improved reporting accuracy by **25%**.
• Created event-driven microservices with **Celery** and **Redis**, facilitating asynchronous processing of financial data, resulting in a **40%** decrease in response time for transaction requests.
• Managed deployment of microservices on **Azure App Services**, utilizing **Terraform** for infrastructure automation, ensuring consistent and scalable environments with a **99.9%** uptime.
• Engineered data pipelines for secure regulatory data exchange using **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, streamlining data flows and improving efficiency by **50%**.
• Conducted security audits to ensure compliance with industry standards, integrating **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for managing authentication, thereby enhancing security protocols.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams, facilitating smooth system integration and regulatory compliance, and overseeing successful release management across **3 major projects**.

• Developed robust backend services for trade execution, portfolio management, and account tracking using **Python**, **Flask**, and **PostgreSQL** to enhance trading operations.
• Engineered real-time price feed processors with **asyncio**, **WebSockets**, and **Redis** to deliver up-to-the-minute trading data for high-frequency transactions, ensuring responsiveness within **50 ms**.
• Collaborated closely with frontend teams to provide data through **REST APIs** and **WebSocket** channels for seamless user experience, achieving a transaction success rate of **99.9%**.
• Ensured compliance with regulatory requirements including **MiFID II** and **GDPR**, while upholding internal data security protocols, minimizing risks by **30%**.
• Implemented comprehensive test suites using **PyTest**, **tox**, and mock servers, streamlining QA and CI processes, reducing development cycles by **20%**.
• Introduced job queuing and scheduling solutions utilizing **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, optimizing backend task execution and process management to handle **10,000** concurrent tasks.
